# thunder_system_lro (Resource)

`thunder_system_lro`: Large Receive Offload

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform

  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_system_lro" "thunder_system_lro" {
  disable = 0
}
```
